DOC.brief_summary: This research study study chemotherapy possible treatment Meningiomas ( recurrent ) . The study intervention involve study : -- AZD2014 ( vistusertib )
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study Of Vistusertib ( AZD2014 ) For Recurrent Grade II-III Meningiomas
DOC.detailed_description: This research study Phase II clinical trial . Phase II clinical trial test safety effectiveness investigational intervention learn whether intervention work treat specific disease . `` Investigational '' mean intervention study . The FDA ( U.S. Food Drug Administration ) approve AZD2014 treatment disease . The goal clinical research study learn study drug AZD2014 shrink slow growth meningioma . Based laboratory research , cellular pathway block AZD2014 important growth survival meningioma . Further , treatment meningioma cell laboratory result decreased survival tumor cell . As , purpose research see whether treat recurrent grade 2-3 meningioma AZD2014 result tumor size stabilization shrinkage . The safety AZD2014 also study . The physical state , symptom , change size tumor , laboratory finding obtain on-study help research team decide AZD2014 safe effective participant condition . AZD2014 study patient various cancer single agent ( drug use alone treat cancer ) combination number well know anticancer therapy . Previous study also allow investigator determine best dose frequency AZD2014 achieve anti-tumor effect reduce likelihood side effect .
DOC.criteria: Participants must histologically confirm intracranial meningioma , grade IIIII , recur progressed previous treatment . Participants must willing able undergo regular MRI scan brain . Participants must measurable disease , define least one lesion accurately measure least one dimension ≥10 mm MRI , perform within 30 day prior study registration . Patients must receive prior surgical resection radiation therapy progressive meningioma . Patients must receive less three prior chemotherapy regimen progressive meningioma . Patients must available archival paraffin tumor block sufficient generate least 20 unstained slide ; , paraffin tumor block unavailable , least 20 unstained slide . Age ≥ 18 year time study enrollment . ECOG performance status ≤2 ( Karnofsky ≥60 % , see Appendix A ) deterioration previous 2 week . Life expectancy great three month Within 14 day study registration , participant must normal organ marrow function define : leukocyte ≥3,000/mcL absolute neutrophil count ≥1,500/mcL hemoglobin ≥90 g/L platelet ≥100,000/mcL total bilirubin ≤1.5 x institutional upper limit normal AST ( SGOT ) /ALT ( SGPT ) ≤2.5 × institutional upper limit normal Serum creatinine ≤1.5 x institutional upper limit normal concurrent creatinine clearance ≥50 mL/min ( measure calculate Cockcroft Gault equation ) , confirmation creatinine clearance require creatinine > 1.5xULN Urine protein ≤1+ urine dipstick ( 2+ see first test , retest least 24 hour later ) PT/INR/PTT ( aPTT ) < 1.5x institutional upper limit normal The effect AZD2014 develop human fetus unknown . Alternatively , woman must documentation irreversible surgical sterilization hysterectomy , bilateral oophorectomy bilateral salpingectomy tubal ligation .
